wartha anuwa, koriyanu widesha amathyanshaye mudrawa balen pahara gena japanun wisin sampaditha lekhanayata ehi mudrawa thabu bawa pawase.mema balakala "giwisumen" sathiyakata pasu, rajya departhamenthuwa wisin ehi eksath janapada thanapathi karyalaya iwath karagnana ladde, koriyawa siya nawa "rakawarana rajya" thaththwaya ekstha janapadayata danumdimatath perayi.[9]

mahinda rajapaksha hitapu janadhipathi loka kamkaru dinaya da galu muwadora pawathi eekabadda wipakshaye mayi rauliyata sahabhagi wu siyalu denata hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sthuthiya pala karayi.
ape thaththa bigena awith hamadama ammatayi matayi thadibanawaya.
emenma radawum niyoga prashna kirime balayak mahesthrath adhikaranayata nomathi athara ema niyoga balathmaka kirima pamanak mahesthrath adhikaranayata sidu kala haki we.
me hasirimwala samasthaya apa thula kukusak upadawanneya.
ithin rode pahalata thallu karanna nam pare kawuruwath nathi welawak wenda epaya.
me athara, janadhipathiwaraya giya brahaspathinda galle uthsawa dekakata giyeya.
ee wasthare methak kisima raja kenek andala nathi jathiye istharam andumaklu.

me sambandhayen katha kirima sandaha eeye(25) wimal wirawansha mahatha hitapu janadhipathi saha kurunagala parlimenthu manthri mahinda rajapaksha mahathawa ohuge kolambaa niwasedi hamuwi athi athara ehidi wimal thaman saha thama pakshayata sidu wu mema pa pahara pilibandawa dadi kanassallen yuthuwa pawasa atha.

shri lanka nidahas pakshaya nawatha wathawak pohottuwa lakuna wenuwata podu lakunak bhawithayata gathayuthu wima arabaya pawathi gataluwa mathukara atha.

rajya niladharin da thaman matha balahathkaraya yodawamin sitina bawa pawasana pradeshawasi janathawa nisi thakseruwak ho wandi gewanu labana kramawedaya pilibandawa ho pahadili kirimak nomathiwa ema niladharin thama idam ha depala marga sanwardhanaya wenuwen pawarimata katayuthu karana lesa balapam karana bawa da prakasha karathi.
awkannadi ramuwa, andume warnaya ha galapana ayath innawa.
mamath ooya eemel eka kiyawala thiyenawa, namuth umbaa lesatama wade dila thiyenawa.

mema nithiwirodhi nalika wala kebal adim karyayan hi niratha wana pudgalayange jiwitha nirayasayenma anathurata lak wi athi bawath ee karyayan itu kirimedi ema sewakayange jiwithawalata wagakimak ho watinakamak da adala aayathana wisin laba nodena bawath api danimu.
me naduwa damme parlimenthu mathiwaranaya welawe.
